mimeTypes.description: Allows a user to register custom mime types or extension mappings.

writeToDisk.description: Allows to write generated files on disk.

methods.description: Allows to pass the list of HTTP request methods accepted by the middleware.

publicPath.description: The `publicPath` specifies the public URL address of the output files when referenced in a browser.

stats.description: Stats options object or preset name.

serverSideRender.description: Instructs the module to enable or disable the server-side rendering mode.

outputFileSystem.description: Set the default file system which will be used by webpack as primary destination of generated files.

index.description: Allows to serve an index of the directory.
